arts.ttl: 'Worrying' & 'staggering' - Why do Man City keep conceding?
arts.sum: Match of the Day's Gary Lineker, Alan Shearer and Ashley Williams look at Manchester City's "worrying" performance against Aston Villa, and why they seem to be conceding so many goals this season.

arts.ttl: Tottenham star Dejan Kulusevski sends Liverpool warning as Man City remark repeated
arts.sum: TOTTENHAM vs LIVERPOOL: Dejan Kulusevski is striving to continue his blistering form against Arne Slot's Reds this weekend as Ange Postecoglou's side bid to make it three wins on the spin in all competitions

arts.ttl: 'Don't think so': Pep Guardiola explains why West Ham and Crystal Palace will not sign £20m ace in January
Rogers stars as Villa beat Man City to leave champions SIXTH
arts.sum: Morgan Rogers scored one goal and assisted another as Aston Villa got back to winning ways with a 2-1 victory over Manchester City in the Premier League on Saturday. Duran beat Ortega one-v-one six minutes after the break, only to be denied by the offside flag, but shortly after the hour mark, Rogers picked up the ball deep in his own half and brushed off City’s midfield to play a one-two with McGinn before slotting it into the far bottom corner.

arts.ttl: 'He cannot handle it': £25m striker told not to join Arsenal or Man City despite 16 goals in 18 games
arts.sum: He is maybe not ready yet...

arts.ttl: Man City receive Pep Guardiola resignation message after Aston Villa defeat
arts.sum: Manchester City fans have been told about the reality of Pep Guardiola's future at the club amid their spiralling form.

arts.ttl: Jack Grealish gesture shows true Manchester City colours after Aston Villa defeat
arts.sum: Manchester City fell to a 2-1 defeat at Aston Villa in the Premier League with Jack Grealish heckled by his old supporters throughout
